name: Harmless Skeleton
description: Harmless Skeleton is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass a variety of levels for an evil skeleton named Skeleton. In this platform game your main task is to collect clues that will ultimately help open the door to the house of the skeleton. On each level there are 4 keys collecting those opens the door to the house of the Skeleton, and then you will be taken to the next level. Be careful on your way are various traps and obstacles. The skeleton is very fragile creature, any wrong move or collision with any obstacle will entail the death of this creature. But don't worry if you suddenly die, since the Skeleton has only one life it must be spent wisely. If you die - you will have to start the level over again.
